text:
TradeIt | Software Engineer | New York | Onsite | Visa considered | https://www.trade.it

We're a small but senior team made up of finance veterans and ex-Pivotal consultants. We build products that allow app developers to offer live stock market trading to their users through their existing brokerage accounts.

Tech stack is a Java backend, with Swift and Android SDKs.

Interview process: initial phone chat followed by a half day on-site where you'll pair on the actual product and be free to ask us any questions.

Details: https://angel.co/tradeit/jobs/80530-software-engineer
